title: Lawson Craddock Tour de France diary: The ‘big loop’ ends in Paris on a high
content:
In his final diary entry, Lawson Craddock takes us inside the final stage on the Champs-Élysées and reflects after a hard month of racing.

Read the full article at Lawson Craddock Tour de France diary: The ‘big loop’ ends in Paris on a high on Velo.
author: ahood
